20110128151923.000|20110128151924.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110128151924.000|20110128151924.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110128151924.000|20110128151928.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110128151928.000|20110128151928.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110128151928.000|20110128151930.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110128151930.000|20110128151930.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110128151930.000|20110128151933.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110128151933.000|20110128151933.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110128151933.000|20110128151933.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110128151933.000|20110128151937.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110128151937.000|20110128151937.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110128151937.000|20110128151939.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110128151939.000|20110128151939.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110128151939.000|20110128151942.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110128151942.000|20110128151942.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110128151942.000|20110128151944.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110128151944.000|20110128151944.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110128151944.000|20110128151946.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110128151946.000|20110128151946.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110128151946.000|20110128151949.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110128151949.000|20110128151949.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110128151949.000|20110128151951.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110128151951.000|20110128151951.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110128151951.000|20110128151954.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110128151954.000|20110128151954.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110128151954.000|20110128151956.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110128151956.000|20110128151956.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110128151956.000|20110128151959.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110128151959.000|20110128152000.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110128152000.000|20110128152000.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110128152000.000|20110128152002.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110128152002.000|20110128152002.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110128152002.000|20110128152005.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110128152005.000|20110128152005.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110128152005.000|20110128152007.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.

20110128152009.000|20110128152013.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.

20110128153507.000|20110128153509.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110128153509.000|20110128153511.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110128153511.000|20110128153511.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110128153511.000|20110128153513.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110128153513.000|20110128153513.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110128153513.000|20110128153515.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110128153515.000|20110128153515.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110128153515.000|20110128153517.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110128153517.000|20110128153519.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110128153519.000|20110128153519.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110128153519.000|20110128153521.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110128153521.000|20110128153521.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110128153521.000|20110128153524.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110128153524.000|20110128153524.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110128153524.000|20110128153526.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110128153526.000|20110128153526.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110128153526.000|20110128153529.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110128153529.000|20110128153529.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110128153529.000|20110128153530.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110128153530.000|20110128153530.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110128153530.000|20110128153532.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110128153532.000|20110128153534.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110128153534.000|20110128153534.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110128153534.000|20110128153536.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110128153536.000|20110128153536.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110128153536.000|20110128153538.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110128153538.000|20110128153539.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110128153539.000|20110128153539.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110128153539.000|20110128153541.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110128153541.000|20110128153541.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110128153541.000|20110128153544.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110128153544.000|20110128153544.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110128153544.000|20110128153546.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110128153546.000|20110128153547.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110128153547.000|20110128153547.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110128153547.000|20110128153550.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110128153550.000|20110128153550.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110128153550.000|20110128153552.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110128153552.000|20110128153552.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110128153552.000|20110128153554.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110128153554.000|20110128153554.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110128153554.000|20110128153556.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110128153556.000|20110128153556.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110128153556.000|20110128153558.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110128153558.000|20110128153558.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110128153558.000|20110128153601.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110128153601.000|20110128153602.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110128153602.000|20110128153604.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,
